divs: sighting detailsi was on my meade etx 125ec telescope looking at orion's nebula and this red light appears in my cross hair star finder in the dark. i see this red light blinking on my finder. so i looked around the room to see if any lights or red light were present but none it was all dark where i was. i looked back in it and it was moving in a pretty nice steady speed so i tried veiw it on the scope part and every time i tried the object would change directions as if it knew i was trying to veiw it. it kept the same northward direction it just moved front,back,up,and down movements still traveling in one direction. it lasted about 1 1\2 to 2min appr. until the building next to me blocked the veiw. so a red light far away,out of any air plane or any thing like that reach,moving pretty fast changing directions,heading northward,around 10 to 10:30 pm eastern time. i can't tell you what it was i saw i'm hopeing you can tell me but i can tell you i had tears in my eyes and i felt real cold and weird as i'm looking and afterwards i just wanted to tell everyone.
Summary: Red light moving fast in all directions.
